OOC: If no one objects, i'll take care of the Iron Skull NPCs until we
deci=
de who deals with what.

BIC:

Deadfur tumbled and crashed into a wall. He =
got up painfully and
turned to the new guy.

Deadfur: Oh come on! You gotta=
 be kidding me! I just resurected you
and you power off on me like this... =
Talk about reliable. But good
thing. You made it this far, I'm impressed. N=
ow let's find some CRs
for the both of us.

He dragged the plane bot into a=
 small watchpost right on the edge of
the platform and found two emergency =
CRs empty. The post itself was
empty, but Deadfur didn't make anything of i=
t, tired as he was. He
installed the guy in, then got into his own and star=
ted the repairs.

In the streets nearby, the Iron Skulls were subtly sneaki=
ng into the
Parliament, using their still valid accesses to assemble a dead=
ly
group inside, ready to defend it for as long as they could. As of yet,
n=
o one had started to realize what was going on...
